    		Academic Calendar
    	









Online calendars2022-20232023-2024Printable calendars2022-2023* (PDF)2023-2024 (PDF)*The 2022-2023 calendar was amended in September 2021 to include dates from October 2021–May 2022 that pertain to the fall 2022 semester.Purpose of CalendarThe Academic Calendar reflects California State University, Chico's academic semesters and includes the intersession terms (winter and summer). Each calendar is created annually and maintained by APSS. It is approved by the University president and published with an Executive Memorandum from the Office of the President.This calendar does not indicate workdays, which can be found on the CSU, Chico Faculty/Staff Calendar.Academic Calendar LibraryThe library provides access to the five previous Academic Calendars, including the PDF versions which can be accessed through the individual calendar links.2021–20222020–2021Spring 2020Fall 2019Spring 2019Fall 2018Spring 2018Fall 2017Other CalendarsFaculty/Staff CalendarCampus CalendarOffice of the RegistrarStudent Services Center, Room 110530-898-5142registrar@csuchico.eduwww.csuchico.edu/registrar/Related DepartmentsAcademic Publications and Scheduling ServicesArticulationDegree Audit ProgrammingGraduation AdvisingVeteran Education Transition ServicesStudent Records and Registration
We acknowledge and are mindful that Chico State stands on lands that were originally occupied by the first people of this area, Mechoopda, and we recognize their distinctive spiritual relationship with this land, the flora, the fauna, and the waters that run through campus. We are humbled that our campus resides upon sacred lands that since time immemorial have sustained the Mechoopda people and continue to do so today.Contact UsNeed Help?FacebookFacebookTwitterTwitterInstagramInstagramReport an accessibility issueReport a broken link on this pageTitle IXPrivacy PolicyCalifornia State University, Chico400 West First StreetChico, CA 95929Copyright © 2023 All Rights Reserved
